title: Ranked disable ?
body: I made one rank today but now i can t they are unavailable HELP !

replies.body: I also can't play ranked. The options are simply grayed out. I have restarted the client twice.
I don't see any issues with playing ranked matches.  Have you updated the client with the recent 6.24 patch?  If the issue persists let me know, as well as which client version you're on.
Also seeing the gray out issue
I have the same issue. I can only play Blind Pick. The other three are grayed out. I have patch 6.24 and I'm using the client update.
